nodes.text: A phone was a communications device that permitted two or more users to conduct a conversation when they were not in the same vicinity of each other to be heard directly. Phones were often found in public places on planets such as Coruscant.

In several episodes of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series, the word "phone" appears on Aurebesh signs in the streets of Coruscant. It is not known exactly what the Star Wars version of a phone is. It is possible that this is a form of public comlink. It could also be the the public holographic system Ahsoka Tano uses to contact Barriss Offee in the episode To Catch a Jedi.
